title: Marksmen are still mandatory
body:
Marksmen are still mandatory in the majority of team compositions.  Bot lane is still treated as synonymous with ADC and ADC is still treated as synonymous with marksmen.  They're more than half of the top 10 play rate champions, 9/10 of the most played bot lane champions, plenty with >50% win rate, still building crit in their top winrate builds, still viable in lanes other than bot lane (Quinn is #1 highest winrate in top lane). Marksmen honestly need a lot more nerfs to make other classes even viable 25% of the time in bot lane. Marksmen mains are simply the most spoiled and loudest playerbase in the game.

I am an angry support main who is fed up with nothing but marksmen for years. I want to be able to support other classes and I am sick of marksmen mains holding game balance hostage simply because of their number advantage due to this one champion class somehow having gotten to make up 25% of the total pick rates in the game.  Marksmen need more nerfs but they're getting buffs because Riot has heard their cries and apparently they can't afford to sell a few less Ezreal skins.

By the way, yes, the current meta sucks.  Buffing marksmen won't make tanks not die in 0.8 seconds though.  If anything, it will make that situation worse.  I agree playing marksmen and getting assassinated in 0.2 seconds with no reasonable counterplay feels like shit, but that's a separate issue.  Marksmen nerfs have been a step in the right direction, but other areas of balance have gone sideways in the meantime and are making the meta suck in unrelated ways.  Marksmen players begging for buffs and crit reverts are being unreasonable.

I think you are confusing "Mandatory" with "optimal" and even then it only applies to the very top ones.

The two core issues that made them Mandatory were Objective control and early game laning.

The first problem was fixed a while ago, no longer need them for objective control because other classes can now do the same damage to objectives as they can

The second problem was changed recently, other classes can survive against them now that enchanters cannot shield them as well.

The second change created a new problem where the adcs that relied on a support heavily are struggling where the ones that do not are still fine. Then you have {{champion:110}}  who was in a bad spot well before the ADC changes to begin with so he is just his own individual problem.
In the context of game meta, optimal and mandatory are essentially the same.  Having 5 active members on your team is optimal, but you could win a 4 vs 5 despite having an afk, so it's not mandatory.

You want to support other things than marksmen? Then Riot needs to implement support items that benefit things like bruisers and mages.

Support itemization has items like "Auto attacks deal extra magic damage" and "Personal healing based off your targets damage" as well as "Deal burn damage based off of your auto attacking".

Until there are real option for support to have other items, support will be the role that has its entire effective item distribution centered around marksmen.

If you want to believe marksman are "Mandatory" then go for it, but we have seen plenty of evidence in solo queue, flex queue, and pro play that state you can now run a comp without a marksman and be fine, leaving support available to build more selfishly due to not needing the specific synergy items.
